title: [Smarten Up, South Nook]
description: The south end of the wagon has been painted in muted green shades and clusters of ferns and crocuses have been propped up on the end of a set of rough oak shelves.  An oversized varnished oak couch sits snugly between a recess at the far wall of the wagon, the vibrant color of its cushion faded in the middle.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
